title: Lionel Richie Joins Us To Remember His Friend Kenny Rogers + Lunchbox’s Wife Is Drinking Again + Little Things Our Significant Others Do That Annoy Us
itunes:title: Lionel Richie Joins Us To Remember His Friend Kenny Rogers + Lunchbox’s Wife Is Drinking Again + Little Things Our Significant Others Do That Annoy Us
description:
We talk to Lionel Richie about his friend Kenny Rogers, the story behind the song “Lady” and working with Bobby on American Idol. Lunchbox's wife is back to drinking again after having their second baby! Plus, we all share little things we do that annoy our significant others.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
